title: Apple, AT&T, GE, Alphabet, and Other Stocks for Investors to Watch This Week
text:
The busiest stretch of earnings season continues this week, with 146 S&P 500 components reporting their third-quarter results. Alphabet, AT&T, Walgreens Boots Alliance, and T-Mobile US all report on Monday. General Motors and Advanced Micro Devices are Tuesday’s highlights, followed by Apple, Facebook, and General Electric on Wednesday. Kraft Heinz and DuPont report on Thursday, then oil majors Exxon Mobil and Chevron close out the week on Friday.

It’s an equally busy week on the economic-data front. The main event...
description: It’s another packed week of third-quarter earnings reports. Plus, a Federal Reserve interest-rate decision, October jobs numbers, and the first estimate of third-quarter GDP.
